TEXT.TITLE: STANFORD TELECOMMUNICATIONS <STII> WINS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Stanford Telecommunications Inc said it was awarded a three-year contract for 2,945,052 dlrs to support the National Aeronautics and Space Administration's Goddard Space Flight Center. The company said its tasks will include mission modeling, ground system specific task assignements, ground system architecture/operations studies, transition planning, frequency management support, radio frequency interference development and system engineering. Reuter
